flavorText: The seeds of memory grow eternal.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Samen der Erinnerung sprießen ewig.
foreignData.name: Sprössling aus Murasa
foreignData.text:
Bonus {1}{G} (Du kannst zusätzlich {1}{G} bezahlen, sowie du diesen Zauberspruch wirkst.)
Wenn der Sprössling aus Murasa ins Spiel kommt und falls seine Bonuskosten bezahlt wurden, bringe eine Karte deiner Wahl mit einer Bonusfähigkeit aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: Las semillas del recuerdo crecen eternamente.
foreignData.name: Germinantes de Murasa
foreignData.text:
Estímulo {1}{G}. (Puedes pagar {1}{G} adicionales al lanzar este hechizo.)
Cuando los Germinantes de Murasa entren al campo de batalla, si fueron estimulados, regresa la carta objetivo con una habilidad de estímulo de tu cementerio a tu mano.

foreignData.flavorText: Les graines des souvenirs poussent pour l'éternité.
foreignData.name: Dragionte de Murasa
foreignData.text:
Kick {1}{G} (Vous pouvez payer {1}{G} supplémentaires au moment où vous lancez ce sort.)
Quand le Dragionte de Murasa arrive sur le champ de bataille, s'il a été kické, renvoyez une carte avec une capacité de kick ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.

foreignData.flavorText: I semi della memoria crescono in eterno.
foreignData.name: Germogliante di Murasa
foreignData.text:
Potenziamento {1}{G} (Puoi pagare {1}{G} addizionale mentre lanci questa magia.)
Quando il Germogliante di Murasa entra nel campo di battaglia, se è stato potenziato, riprendi in mano una carta bersaglio con un'abilità potenziamento dal tuo cimitero.

foreignData.flavorText: 思い出の種子は永遠に育つ。
foreignData.name: ムラーサの発芽種
foreignData.text:
キッカー{1}{G}（あなたはこの呪文を唱えるに際し、追加で{1}{G}を支払ってもよい。）
ムラーサの発芽種が戦場に出たとき、これがキッカーされていた場合、あなたの墓地からキッカー能力を持つカード１枚を対象とする。それをあなたの手札に戻す。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 植物・エレメンタル

foreignData.name: 무라사 새싹정령
foreignData.text:
키커 {1}{G} (당신은 이 주문을 발동하면서 추가로 {1}{G}를 지불할 수 있다.)
무라사 새싹정령이 전장에 들어올 때, 무라사 새싹정령의 키커 비용이 지불되었다면, 당신의 무덤에 있는 키커 능력을 가진 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreignData.flavorText: As sementes da memória crescem, eternas.
foreignData.name: Brotinho de Murasa
foreignData.text:
Reforçar {1}{G} (Você pode pagar um custo adicional de {1}{G} ao jogar esta mágica.)
Quando Brotinho de Murasa entrar no campo de batalha, se ele tiver sido reforçado, devolva o card alvo com uma habilidade reforçar de seu cemitério para sua mão.

foreignData.name: Мурасский Росток
foreignData.text:
Усилитель {1}{G} (При разыгрывании этого заклинания вы можете дополнительно заплатить {1}{G}.)
Когда Мурасский Росток выходит на поле битвы, если он получил Усилитель, верните целевую карту со способностью Усилителя из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.

foreignData.name: 姆拉撒播芽灵
foreignData.text:
增幅{1}{G}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{1}{G}。）
当姆拉撒播芽灵进战场时，若它已增幅，则将目标具任一增幅异能的牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

foreignData.name: 姆拉撒播芽靈
foreignData.text:
增幅{1}{G}（你施放此咒語時可以額外支付{1}{G}。）
當姆拉撒播芽靈進戰場時，若它已增幅，則將目標具任一增幅異能的牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。

name: Murasa Sproutling
originalText:
Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.)
When Murasa Sproutling enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target card with a kicker ability from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: Kicker represents an optional additional cost that you may choose to pay as you cast the spell. A spell cast with that additional cost paid is “kicked.”
You can’t pay a kicker cost more than once.
If you put a permanent with a kicker ability onto the battlefield without casting it, you can’t kick it.

If you copy a kicked spell, the copy is also kicked. If a card or token enters the battlefield as a copy of a permanent that’s already on the battlefield, the new permanent isn’t kicked, even if the original was.

To determine a spell’s total cost, start with the mana cost (or an alternative cost if another card’s effect allows you to pay one instead), add any cost increases (such as kicker), then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the spell is determined only by its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was.

Some instant or sorcery spells require alternative or additional targets if they’re kicked. You ignore these targeting requirements if those spells aren’t kicked, and you can’t kick those spells unless you can choose the appropriate targets. On the other hand, you can kick a permanent spell even if you won’t be able to choose targets for an enters-the-battlefield ability of that permanent once the spell resolves.

An ability that triggers when a player casts a kicked spell resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger, but after targets have been chosen for that spell. It resolves even if that spell is countered.
